reason.tex: %text Notice the two pairs $(3,9)$ and $(3,11)$. For the same $x (=3)$ we have two different $y (=9,11)$ Hence, this cannot be a function. For a relation to be a function, each $x$ must map to \underline\text{exactly one $y$} %
